content: Revolut Sign Up Bonus (€25+€10 withdrawable cash or crypto)Offer valid until: 2023/05/09Only 5 spots available.You can have the bonuses credited to you in around one hour.You just need to follow a few simple steps:1. Complete the sign up process for a Revolut account with the referral link provided by me.*This includes passing Revolut's KYC verification.*Please note: If you have previously signed up for Revolut, you won't be able to claim the bonus.Message me for the referral link!2. Top up your Revolut account with the required minimum amount from an external source, such as a card top-up or transfer from another bank.**The required minimum deposit amounts vary by region - it is typically around €10.Transfers from other Revolut accounts won't count towards this requirement.3. Order a free physical card**Delivery fees might be charged; depending on country and other factors decided by Revolut.4. Make 3 card purchases with each purchase amounting to the required minimum amount.*You can also complete the 3 purchases with an instant ready virtual card in the Revolut app - to receive the bonus immediately.*The required minimum transaction amounts vary by region - it is typically around €3-5 - not all types of card transactions are considered valid purchases.Transactions involving gambling, gift cards, currency exchange services, and money transfers may not be considered valid purchases.If you successfully complete all these steps, you will receive your €25 bonus within 1 hour directly to your Revolut balance or to your selected crypto address.Please note that if you reverse any of these steps after completing them, you won't receive the reward, or the reward that was previously paid may be reversed.*For example, if you cancel your card before receiving it or refund one of the purchases, the reward may be invalidated.*Reward payout via crypto is only available for trusted Bitcointalk users.5. After completing Revolut's KYC within the app; you can also claim around €10 worth of Learn & Earn crypto rewards - that can be instantly converted to whatever currency you like; inside the app.6. Enjoy free €35.
